## Alignment with cloudtap Goals

How does this feature align with cloudtap's focus areas?

- [ ] Observability (timeline, metrics, tracing)
- [ ] Policy enforcement (default-deny, allow lists)
- [ ] Audit trails (tamper-evident logging)
- [ ] Adapter support (frp, ngrok, cloudflared)
